meanings.definition: The act of attending a movie theater to watch a film.
meanings.sent1: Moviegoing is a fun way to spend time with friends.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy moviegoing on weekends to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent3: The family's moviegoing adventure turned into a popcorn fight!
meanings.sent4: Her moviegoing escapade was a journey through different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The magic of moviegoing transports you to new places.

meanings.definition: The experience of going to see a movie.
meanings.sent1: My favorite part of moviegoing is getting popcorn at the theater.
meanings.sent2: Moviegoing allows you to escape reality for a couple of hours.
meanings.sent3: During moviegoing, I always end up eating too much candy.
meanings.sent4: Her moviegoing experience was like a rollercoaster of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The joy of moviegoing is unmatched by any other activity.
